content: परतस् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} From another; <ls>Bv. 1. 120.</ls> {@--2@} From an enemy; <ls>R. 3. 48.</ls> {@--3@} Further, more (than), beyond, after, over (often with <ab>abl.</ab>); द्धेः परतस्तु सः <ls>Bg. 3. 42.</ls> {@--4@} Other wise. {@--5@} Differently. {@--6@} Further afterwards.
